metadata.Abstract: Cloud Fraction is derived from the cloud cover product generated using the radiance and reflectance measurements from the thermal infrared and visible channels respectively along with water vapour channel from Very High Resolution Radiometer (VHRR) onboard INSAT-3D. The approach followed is to generate a clear sky composite using visible and thermal channels and then applying thresholds to arrive at detection of a cloudy pixel. A pixel is defined as cloudy if it satisfies the conditions in all the three channels used. Cloud fraction products are being made available at half-hourly intervals (i.e. 48 acquisitions per day).
metadata.MD_Keywords: Cloud Cover, Cloud Fraction, Insat-3D, VHRR
